attributes.long-description:
You wake up alone on an unknown beach -- your boat and entire fleet missing... It's the beginning of an epic odyssey to find out just what game the gods are playing with you, King Argos. Your fate now lies in their hands. Battle like the fierce Spartan warrior you are to avoid a tragic death as you journey through the 8 levels, from the Oracle's Island to the mysterious Atlantis and the depths of the Underworld. You will fight the most phenomenal monsters from mythology, defy Cerberus and the Cyclops, and challenge the gods themselves!

- Unleash your hero’s special powers by performing combos to get rid of legions of enemies in epic fights.
- Fabulous equipment and 5 mythic weapons to upgrade: draw your mythic swords, axe, and bow!
- A colossal quest that offers hours of lifespan. - Fight, explore, solve puzzles... more than a basic hack-and-slash, you enter a real odyssey.

It's your chance to write your own legend... if you can survive this mythic adventure.
